title: HyperLens 6.01 incl Cracked Exe - Magnifier Zooms Layers As Well
description:
HyperLens 6.01 incl Cracked Exe - Zooms Layers As Well

Found this Gen on direct links.

works on XP/Vista/7 (and probably Win 8 but not tested it)

Tested it with windows 7 32bit edition running Avasta 

although the cursors didnt seem to work for me. but the zooming
etc other functions seem to be OK.

Has Full screen mode and Rectangle box you can move about to magify
under it.

--> better then intellimouses/MS windows Magnifier

as does Layered windows as well...

and heaps more functions besides..

call it up with a hot key or mouse button (using intellimouse software
send keystroke)


Help seed if grabbing as I cant do it alone

Cheers
